name: Ajax Marketing Slider Lite
author: soamnovum

sections.description:
Display entire categories from one ajax content slider

The Marketing Slider can display entire categories in one fully responsive jQuery Ajax slider.

  • Infinite slide through your posts
  • Create an Ajax category slider and using shortcodes embed it in any of your posts or pages
  • Exclude posts from slider
  • The slider makes it much easier to surf your posts from all devices
  • Customize the fonts, buttons and colors of the slider to your preference for better conversion
  • Create unlimited sliders
  • Autoslide interval
  • More to come!
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ajax-marketing-slider-lite directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘Marketing Slider’ add new and start creating your first slider

How to use

  • Go to “marketing slider”->”Add new”
  • Add a title (For your reference only)
  • select the categories to include and the posts to exclude
  • Click on publish
  • Go to the editor of the page/post where you want to add the slider
  • Beside the “Add media” button there is a new button called “Marketing slider”
  • Select the slider you just created from the dropdown and click “Insert slider shortcode”
  • Now you will see the slider loading your posts on the frontend
